nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements
Interface MessageCategoryService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
MessageCategoryServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageCategoryServiceImpl, MessageCategoryServiceSecurity
public interface MessageCategoryService
extends Service

Service interface for Message Category operations like crud (create, remove, update, delete) search and list.

Author:
jeancarlo
